meanings.definition: To improve the quality or appearance of (something) by making small changes
meanings.sent1: She is refinishing her old dresser to make it look new again.
meanings.sent2: The carpenter is refinishing the wooden table to remove the scratches.
meanings.sent3: After refinishing the chair, it looked so polished that it seemed to sparkle.
meanings.sent4: The artist was refinishing the painting, adding vibrant colors to bring it to life.
meanings.sent5: Refinishing the floor transformed the room into a bright and inviting space.

meanings.definition: The act of improving the quality or appearance of (something) by making small changes
meanings.sent1: The refinishing of the cabinets made the kitchen look brand new.
meanings.sent2: Refinishing can greatly enhance the value of antique furniture.
meanings.sent3: The refinishing of the statue made it the centerpiece of the museum.
meanings.sent4: The refinishing of the car gave it a glossy finish that caught everyone's eye.
meanings.sent5: The refinishing of the walls with a fresh coat of paint brightened up the entire room.
